## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Plant at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-6.5, 0.0) connected to offshore pump via pipes
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 0.5) connected to boiler via pipes
- Power network (id=818) connecting to all mining drills

### Secondary Power Plant at position (-15.5, -3.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-15.5, -3.5) (status: WORKING)
- Boiler at (-12.0, -4.5) (status: NO_FUEL, warnings: out of fuel)
- Steam engine at (-8.5, -4.5) (status: NOT_CONNECTED, warnings: no input liquid)
- Power network (id=5262) currently inactive

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Facility at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- 5 Electric mining drills (all unpowered, outputting downward):
  - (15.5, 70.5) - status: NO_POWER
  - (18.5, 70.5) - status: NO_POWER
  - (21.5, 70.5) - status: NO_POWER
  - (24.5, 70.5) - status: NO_POWER
  - (27.5, 70.5) - status: NO_POWER
- 5 Iron smelting furnaces at:
  - (16.0, 68.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (19.0, 68.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (22.0, 68.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (25.0, 68.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (28.0, 68.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
- 5 Steel smelting furnaces at:

  - (19.0, 65.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (22.0, 65.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (25.0, 65.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
  - (28.0, 65.0) - status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel full
- Ore collection system with:
  - 5 Burner inserters between furnaces (positions 16.5-28.5, 66.5)
  - Wooden chest at (15.5, 73.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Power System Issues (continued)
- Secondary power plant boiler out of fuel
- Steam engine not connected to power network
- All mining drills showing "no power" status
- Verify fuel supply and power connections

### Entity Placement Conflicts (continued)
- Repeated attempts to place chests at occupied positions (15.5, 73.5)
- Failed inserter placement due to blocked positions (15.5, 71.5)
- Failed electric pole placement at occupied positions (15.5, 68.5)
- Always check for existing entities before placement attempts
- Clear space before attempting to place new entities

### Distance Placement Errors (continued)
- Attempted chest placement from too far away (distance 18.25)
- Attempted pole placement from too far away (distance 70.02)
- Always move within placement range (max 10 tiles) before attempting placement

### Production Chain Problems (continued)
- All furnaces showing "no ingredients" despite cleared outputs
- Inserters showing "waiting for source items"
- Verify proper connections between drills and furnaces
- Check inserter configurations and orientations

### Belt Connection Errors (new)
- Failed belt connection attempt between mining drills
- Verify proper belt connection API usage
- Ensure source and destination entities are properly specified

### Inserter Configuration (continued)
- Inserters properly configured but still not functioning
- Verify inserter pickup/drop positions are correctly aligned
- Check inserter fuel levels for burner inserters

### Power Pole Placement (new)
- Multiple failed attempts to place small electric poles
- Verify pole placement positions are clear
- Ensure proper spacing between poles (7-9 tiles recommended)
